Hi, I'm Vincent.

Front End Developer.

I'm a software developer from North Carolina specializing in building (and occasionally desigining) websites, applications, and everything in between.

I am a fast learner who is enthusiastic about writing code. I've learned to be detail oriented, patient, and committed in every line of code I write and ship.
